tool.name: Get
tool.description: Retreive a single document from the Gigaword Datasource.
tool.help:
Retrieves a single document from Gigaword. Use the *Gigaword List* tool to obtain a list of valid document ID values.
.. class:: infomark
To obtain documents from Gigaword you **must**:
1. Be an LDC licensee 2. `Obtain an OAuth Token <https://grid.anc.org:9443/ldc-authorize/>`_
To obtain an OAuth token visit the link above and log in with your LDC id and password. Then paste the OAuth token into the above field.
